messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Dormitories.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Muslim Tomb Five, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Muslim Tomb Five. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright ye CUCKS!! I WANT SECURITY TOP NOTCH AROUND HERE AND I WANT YA DOING YOUR DAMN JOB OR ILL HAVE YE EXECUTED FOR INSUBORDINATION!  have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Muslim Tomb Five, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All personell come to the bridge for a public execution of the RD bui;lds the bases who is guilty of beijng a traitor

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Robotics Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Primary Hallway.
